alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 7:24PM EDT until June 12 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for portions of... Beaufort County in southeastern South Carolina... Charleston County in southeastern South Carolina... Colleton County in southeastern South Carolina... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 724 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near White Hall to 6 miles northeast of Ladys Island to near Port Royal, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include: Beaufort, Port Royal, Edisto Beach, Johns Island, Seabrook Island, Kiawah Island, Meggett, Rockville, Edisto Island, Fripp Island, Bears Bluff, and Parris Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
